revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Digletts Cave |image = [[File:Digletts Cave.png]] |caption = An overhead map of Digletts Cave. |tokens = 95 |location = North of Viridian Forest, on Route 2. }} '''Digletts Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 1,208 |- | Dugtrio (Boss) || 6,040 |}
==Pokémon==
* Diglett * Dugtrio (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 57% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 28% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 14% |}
